Reviews.Title: “Misleading booking policy”
Reviews.Author: belgajules
Reviews.Content: I had booked a 5 night stay through agoda. Due to airlines delays i was not able to arrive on the scheduled day of arrival, though i informed by mail of my arrival the next morning. Upon arrival you will need to pay your entire stay and they charged the 5 nights. even though i actually did not stay 5 but only 4 nights. There was no way of getting them to pay 4 nights. The requested superiour double room turned out to be a twin room. But after asking we could change into double bed room. The hotel is clean and very central located in Little India. Staff was friendly and helpful. There are 2 pc's in the lobby area, but they cannot be used. (for some reason) Free wi-fi is offered if you bring your own portable device, there is a lift in the building. Singapore is not a cheap please but the this is quite a good value. Basement rooms have no windows. room 103 has a window which is located directly on street level, keep your curtains closed if you do not like having spectators

Reviews.Title: “Best budget class hotel in Little India”
Reviews.Author: Raj S
Reviews.Content: It's newly renovated budget class hotel of fragrance hotel group. Located very close to little India MRT and very hot location in dunlop street.

Reviews.Title: “Nice and Comfortable”
Reviews.Author: JaimeKavitha
Reviews.Content: They have changed this hostel to Hotel Fragrance Elegance located in Dunlop Street. We book their family room and we enjoyed our stay in this hotel. The room although was small but very clean and comfortable. The bathroom was clean and the shower was good. The hotel staffs are friendly and helpful. The hotel is located in Little India and there are lots of good indian shops for food and MRT is within walking distance. Would definately come back to this hotel for my next trip

Reviews.Title: “nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: myra2010
Reviews.Content: what we like about Fragrance Backpackers Hostel is its location, its near the MTR station and Little India. the receptionist is very helpful, accommodating & friendly. we arrived at ungodly hour of dawn and still the receptionist welcomed us. you can cook you own food as they have kitchen intended for the guests. the security is good, you things and valuables are safe even if you stayed in their dormitory room. But the other drawback here is that their bedding or blankets still smells from the previous users..

Reviews.Title: “A nice place with friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: ewmy
Reviews.Content: The Fragrance is a great place for a cheap stay in Little India. It's dorms only, but they are quiet, spacious, comfortable and clean. The bathroom facilities are more than decent, and the staff are really friendly and helpful. Provided towels and cheap internet in the business centre are an added bonus. Recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, friendly hostel in Little India.”
Reviews.Author: Amrel
Reviews.Content: I stayed only one night and was severely jet lagged, but the staff was friendly and the dorms were comfortable. I had a locker to store my things, and was able to leave my large bag in the dorm room without any difficulties. It is located in Little India, and is within walking distance of the MRT (subway) and several convenience stores and restaurants. This seemed like a fairly standard hostel for a decent price in Singapore and I would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Not too Shabby...”
Reviews.Author: anmulins
Reviews.Content: This is where I stayed while trying to find an apartment and start my life abroad in Singapore. It was a week-long stay and like all hostels I guess, it has it's ewwww factors. For the most part, it was clean and safe. The staff was very nice; they're easy to make friends with. The TV in the media room didn't work when I was there and the couch was ripped apart for some reason, but there is a very decent computer room and laundry room. The bathroom has very good shower heads and you can choose to stay in a room with all girls (if you're a girl that is) which is more comfortable for some travelers. Overall, not a horrible experience.

HotelInfo.Name: Fragrance Backpackers Hostel
HotelInfo.Address: 63 Dunlop Street, Singapore 209391, Singapore
